transcript: Hi, this is Carl Reiss and my date of birthday is July 28, 1995 and I'm calling because I stopped taking meds for me because it makes me dizzy

key_facts: [REDACTED_NAME] stopped taking their medication due to dizziness.
result.recommended_next_step: Pharmacist outreach within 24 hours to address side-effect concern and adherence barrier.
result.safe_patient_reply: Please speak with the pharmacist when they call you. They will further discuss your concerns. If symptoms worsen or you feel unsafe, please seek urgent care.

soap_note.subjective: [REDACTED_NAME] is having issues with dizziness after taking their medication.
soap_note.assessment: [REDACTED_NAME] stopped taking their medication due to dizziness.
soap_note.plan: The pharmacist will review this with [REDACTED_NAME] and discuss any alternatives.

pharmacist_task.summary: [REDACTED_NAME] has an adherence issue with their medication.
